meanings.definition: In a determined or unwavering manner.
meanings.sent1: She walked resolutely towards her goal, never looking back.
meanings.sent2: He faced the challenge resolutely, refusing to give up.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel resolutely tried to climb the slippery pole, only to slide back down comically.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood resolutely in the storm, its branches swaying but never breaking.
meanings.sent5: The detective searched resolutely for the missing clue, determined to solve the case.

meanings.sent1: The resolutely determined student aced the difficult exam.
meanings.sent2: Her resolutely set jaw indicated her strong determination.
meanings.sent3: The resolutely locked door refused to budge, much to the frustration of the cat outside.
meanings.sent4: The resolutely built wall stood strong against the fierce winds.
meanings.sent5: The resolutely loyal dog never left its owner's side, always protecting and comforting.

meanings.definition: With a strong commitment or determination.
meanings.sent1: She worked resolutely towards her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: The team resolutely fought for victory until the very end.
meanings.sent3: The chef resolutely added more spices to the dish, determined to perfect the flavor.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted resolutely, each stroke showing her dedication to the masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The hiker climbed resolutely up the steep mountain, never losing sight of the summit.
